data.actual_result: I was returned to the top of the Nitro Games list, having to scroll back down to the area I was browsing.
data.expected_result: While browsing games, similarly to the actual store, I should not have to scroll back to the area of the store I was at.
data.short_description: Under Library > Nitro Games: When viewing a game and returning, it takes me back to the top of the top of the list.
data.steps_to_repro: - Select "Home" - Select "Library" - Select "Nitro Games" - Scroll down for a bit, then select a game. - Select "Go Back" (Top Left) - You should be back at the top of the list
